about_the_game:
From the same universe of F.I.S.H. comes the next installment: B.I.R.D.! In this game, you play as 4 different birds tasked with stopping a potential world-ending event.



B.I.R.D. is a platformer with heavy emphasis on music-based timings and obstacles. You can run, jump (including in the air), glide, and dive to dodge static obstacles like gears or lava, as well as various types of lasers, which are timed to the song in the level. There are a total of 8 worlds and 29 levels.



Shoe, the smartest bird in the world (debatable), is building a dimensional portal machine that could destroy the world (but he's pretty sure it won't).

The crew of 4 at B.I.R.D., Bill, IO, Rachel, and Dan, are on the move to stop him. However, Shoe has placed many obstacles in their path that are conveniently timed to really awesome music (also debatable). Will you be able to get to him in time before the machine (that will NOT destroy the world) starts up?



If you want an extra challenge, each level has collectable orb(s) that can unlock a perfect attempt, where you cannot take any damage. Can you perfect all 29 levels?

short_description: B.I.R.D. is 2.5D platformer with a big emphasis on music. You play as 4 different birds, each having to dodge various obstacles; some move, some rotate, some are timed to the song. Will you be able to make it in time stop the world from (potentially) being destroyed?
